short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically sum numeric responses in Google Forms and display the totals with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Detailed Description:
Google Form Response Sum is a convenient Chrome extension designed to enhance your Google Forms experience by automatically calculating and displaying the sum of numeric responses. Whether you're a teacher, survey creator, or data analyst, this tool simplifies the task of aggregating numerical data, saving you time and effort.

Key Features:

Automatic Summation: Instantly calculates the sum of numeric responses for each question in your Google Forms.
Inline Display: Sums are displayed directly on the response page, seamlessly integrated with the existing layout.
Real-Time Updates: The extension updates the sums dynamically as responses are loaded or changed.
Easy to Use: No complex setup required. Simply install the extension, and it works automatically on your Google Forms.
Refresh Functionality: Includes a refresh button to manually update the sums if needed.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design for a hassle-free experience.
How to Use:

Install the Google Form Response Sum extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Open your Google Form's response page.
The extension will automatically sum the numeric responses and display the totals at the end of each question.
Click the extension icon to view a summary table of all questions and their respective sums.
Use the refresh button in the popup if you need to update the sums manually.
